input.sentences: she was a little nervous about the first day of school .
she saw the bus driving up her road | and told mom .
she felt like such a big girl with her new backpack .
the bus steps were very high | but she knew she could do it .
at the last minute she remembered to say goodbye to mom .
output.sentences: The girl was nervous for her first day of school.
Her mother told her goodbye as she drove down the road.
The girl was happy to show off her new backpack.
She almost missed a some steps getting on the bus.
The girl will always remember this day since her mom took pictures every minute of that morning.
